input.sentences: when we first walked into the carnival | we were amazed by the beautiful lights on the rides .
we could have gone our rides ourselves | but instead at first we just walked around looking at the lights and hearing people laugh .
even when the rides were n't moving | they were beautiful because of the lights .
there were different light schemes . some were simple colors in weird shapes .
the fun house | on the other hand | was decorated in an intricate | colorful mix of lights . we liked that the best .
output.sentences: They walked around the rides looking at the lights.
The people walked around the rides.
The rides having moving lights on them.
